definitions.definition: An act of handing out something.

subdefinitions.definition: An act of dealing playing cards ; a deal .

definitions.definition: A printed sheet such as a leaflet or pamphlet , or a worksheet , that is given out free of charge (usually by hand ) for a certain use , for example as an advertisement or for information .

subdefinitions.definition: Synonym of press release ( “ an official written statement that is sent to the media so that it can be publicized ” ) .

definitions.definition: A gift of money or material assistance to the needy or poor .

subdefinitions.definition: Something obtained without effort ; a gift, a present .

main_definition: An act of handing out something.
secondary_definitions: A printed sheet such as a leaflet or pamphlet , or a worksheet , that is given out free of charge (usually by hand ) for a certain use , for example as an advertisement or for information .
( informal , often derogatory ) A gift of money or material assistance to the needy or poor .
